website_summaries.verdict: The carefree, relaxed style of the Keds Champion Sweatshirt Jersey makes it a highly qualified pick for spring and summer. Tucked under its heathered jersey cover is a blend of striking features that provide undeniable comfort, flexibility, and durability. The cushioned bed, pliable rubber outsole, and top-to-bottom hard-wearing materials on this revitalized version are among the exact reasons why the highly desired old-time classic hasn’t lost its charm and remain a champion to this day.
pros: A couple of reviewers with wide feet went for their usual size and were not disappointed with the fit
Like other Keds Champion iterations, many consumers are drawn to its heather fabric of as it looks “cute,” “stunning,” and “lovely.”
Many buyers found its price extremely reasonable
Lots of them went for another pair in a different
A type of shoe that’s perfect for lounging around and casual walking, stated by many
Numerous users consider this shoe their go-to casual style
The lightly padded interior moderately cushions the feet during heel to toe strides
The rubber outsole provides reliable traction on various surfaces
cons: According to some buyers, this sneaker felt narrow and somehow constricted the feet from bending easily
This low-top sneaker can get a bit stiff and bites a little on the toes that it needs ample break-in time
The Keds Champion Sweatshirt Jersey runs a bit large as opposed to the canvas and wool versions, described by some buyers
Ons added that she went a half size down to enjoy its fit

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated update to classic Keds
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a casual sneaker to wear with leggings, and these are great - they look good and feel good. I've always liked Keds and the dark grey makes these just a little more sophisticated and versatile than then classic white canvas. One note on the product description - the color is listed as "brown" but they are a very dark charcoal grey. I had found this style in a local store and they didn't have my size, so I snapped a photo of the label and the box and found them online, so I wasn't surprised that they weren't brown as stated in the color choice. Pretty true to the color shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable... what happened to Keds?
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Kids for their comfort. I needed a pair of shoes to stick in my briefcase for running through airports and these looked cute. I also thought since they were made from Champion sweatshirt material they would be soft and comfy. When they arrived, they were stiff as cardboard and tight across the arch. They feel cheap. I wore them a few times hoping they would soften up but they are just stiff and NOT comfortable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JK Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Okay, But Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: They're okay, but not something I'd buy again. The padding is decent, but the inside - especially around the tongue and laces - is rough! Rough enough to wear off skin. I've heard for years how great Keds are... I'm sorry, but not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had bought 2 pairs of the Vollie 2 Keds and loved them but they did not come in black so I got this one. It is not quite as comfortable as the Vollie but pretty close. Like these shoes and wear them often!
customer_reviews.author: stairwaytoheaven

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! These were the perfect size and super soft. I wear them as my everyday commute shoe. Fits true to size, item arrived quickly and without issue.
customer_reviews.author: CDC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, arrived on time and the size was great. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maizie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable with the foam inside, I wear these all the time and ordered a back up pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sunita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love keds! That being said these are comfortable and the gray goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mozby

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Usually hard to fit but these shoes were comfortable on first try. Looked like picture. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received my Keds today and they have a red ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Keds today and they have a red stain on them. Shoes are not made for wide feet and are very narrow. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mata

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Champion Sweatshirt Jersey Fashion Sneaker
feature_bullets: Durable rubber outsole for added comfort
